title: Livestock health certificates and pedigrees
dataVerified: Breeder name, owner name, veterinarian, farm location
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Health/pedigree status (verified/current). Link to veterinarian/breed registry system (owner and buyers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake pedigrees, health certificates. Domain binding verifies veterinarian/breed registry. High-value breeding stock. Long retention. International trade verification.
